vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Est.9.9;
son of: Haman (H2001);
brother of: Parshandatha (H6577), Dalphon (H1813), Aspatha (H0630), Poratha (H6334), Adalia (H0118), Aridatha (H0743), Parmashta (H6534), Aridai (H0742) and Vaizatha (H2055)
§ Arisai = "lion of my banners (?)"
a son of Haman
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞利賽 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我旗幟的獅子(?)"
哈曼的兒子 #斯 9:9|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚利赛 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我旗帜的狮子(?)"
哈曼的儿子 #斯 9:9|
